subject: Re: [junit] Re: Query about passing parameters from @Suite to Junit file
msgSnippet: Hi, Deepankar, As I posted a feedback before in this thread. Please refer to the following URL for simple usage.
messageBody:
Hi, Deepankar,

As I posted a feedback before in this thread. Please refer to the following
URL for simple usage.
http://www.testearly.com/2007/04/13/take-heed-of-mixing-junit-4s-parameterized-tests/

( http://tinyurl.com/69gsza )

You will find it is so cool feature in Junit4. Happy Junit.

Thanks!
2008/12/5 madavahegde <madavahegde@...>

> Hi Deepankar,
>
> Look at parametreized Test Cases.
>
> If you want to pass the parameters then you have to use
> @RunWith(parameterized.class)
>
> Regards,
> Madava hegde
>
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com <junit%40yahoogroups.com>, Deepankar
> <deepankar.narang@...> wrote:
> >
> > Hi,
> >
> > I am still suffering with this issue.
> >
> > I could only find only the below thing in google:
> >
> > *TestSuite suite= new TestSuite();
> > suite.addTest(new MoneyTest("testMoneyEquals"));
> > suite.addTest(new MoneyTest("testSimpleAdd"));
> > TestResult result= suite.run();*
> >
> > Can any one tell me equivalent of the above in below format:
> >
> > *import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
> > import org.junit.runners.Suite;
> >
> > @RunWith(Suite.class)
> > @...( {EmployeeTest.class})
> > *
> >
> > Pleas help as its very important to me.
> >
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> > Deepankar
> >
> >
> > On Fri, Nov 28, 2008 at 5:11 PM, Deepankar <deepankar.narang@...>wrote:
>
> >
> > > Hi,
> > >
> > > I have a small issue. I am using Junit 4 and trying to call a
> junit file
> > > from test Suite.
> > >
> > > *The Suite file* is as follows:-
> > >
> > > *import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
> > > import org.junit.runners.Suite;
> > >
> > > @RunWith(Suite.class)
> > > @...( {EmployeeTest.class})
> > > public class EmployeeTestAMAllTests {
> > > }*
> > >
> > > *Junit Test Class*
> > >
> > > *import org.junit.After;
> > > import org.junit.Before;
> > > import org.junit.Test;
> > >
> > >
> > > public class EmployeeTest {
> > >
> > > public EmployeeTest(String AM_NAME, String VO_NAME) {
> //How
> > > to pass them from the test suite?
> > > super(AM_NAME, VO_NAME);
> > > }
> > >
> > > @Before
> > > public void setUp() throws Exception {
> > > setUpBefore();
> > > }
> > > @Test
> > > public void createRecord() {
> > > testCreateRecord();
> > > }
> > >
> > > @After
> > > public void tearDown() throws Exception {
> > > tearDownAfter();
> > > }*
> > >
> > > The issue I am facing is that I need to pass parameters from the
> Test Suite
> > > to the Junit Test Class file for the instantiation of the file.
> Can anyone
> > > please help me in this as it is very urgent.
> > >
> > > Thanks In advance :-)
> > >
> > > Regards,
> > > Deepankar
> > >
> >
> >
> > [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
> >
>
>
>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
